data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shashank, P. R., Kammar, Vasudev, Mally, Richard, Chakravarthy, A. K. (2018): A new Indian species of shoot and capsule borer of the genus Conogethes (Lepidoptera: Crambidae), feeding on cardamom. Zootaxa 4374 (2): 215-234, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4374.2.3|1 occurrence
